events.message: The claimant reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 14th, involving their car and another vehicle at a traffic intersection.
After reviewing the initial details, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the reported car collision.
An insurance claim agent was assigned to the case to handle further communications and processing related to the vehicle accident claim.
The claimant was contacted to confirm receipt of the accident claim and informed that the investigation process will begin shortly.
The claimant was requested to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and medical bills related to the accident for verification purposes.
The claimant provided all requested documents, including detailed photographs of the damaged car and the official police accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and statements to assess liability and coverage details for the collision claim.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of fault assigned to the other driver; damage to the claimant’s car was fully documented.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the claimant’s vehicle along with medical expenses incurred due to the accident.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely processing of their claim and the fairness of the settlement offered.
Final approval was granted for the claim payout, confirming that the claimant will be compensated according to the agreed settlement amount.
Payment was successfully transferred to the claimant’s designated bank account to cover vehicle repair costs and related accident expenses.
The claim file has been officially closed after confirmation that all payments were received and no further inquiries remain.
The claim was archived as part of routine data management, ensuring all case information is securely stored for future reference.
